Ido <lb n="c57-0066__main__16"/>refuse it,I replied, &no torture shall ever <lb n="c57-0066__main__17"/>extort a consent from me –You may <lb n="c57-0066__main__18"/>render me the most miserable of men<lb n="c57-0066__main__19"/>but you shall never make me base <lb n="c57-0066__main__20"/>in my own eyes. Shall I create another like <lb n="c57-0066__main__21"/>yourselfwhose joint wickedness would<lb n="c57-0066__main__22"/>desolate the world? I am <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0066__main__d4e13145">wick</del> malicious,because <lb n="c57-0066__main__28"/>I am miserable.Am I not shunned &<lb n="c57-0066__main__29"/>hatedby all mankind? Youmy creator<lb n="c57-0066__main__30"/>would tear me to pieces& triumph –<w ana="start"/>Rem<lb n="c57-0066__main__31"/>ember<w ana="end"/> that& tell me why I should pity <lb n="c57-0066__main__32"/>man more than he pities me.You <lb n="c57-0066__main__33"/>would not call it murderif you <w ana="start"/>preci<lb n="c57-0066__main__34"/>pitated<w ana="end"/>me into one of those ice rifts &<lb n="c57-0066__main__35"/>destroyedmy frame, the work of your <mod sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13174"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13176"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13176"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0066__main__d4e13182"/>own<sga-add eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13182"/><mod eID="c57-0066__main__d4e13174"/>hands. <lb n="c57-0066__main__36"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0066__main__d4e13188">And</del> shall I respect manwhen he <w ana="start"/>con-<lb n="c57-0066__main__37"/>temns<w ana="end"/>me? This passion <lb n="c57-0067__main__19"/>is detrimental to me,for you do not <lb n="c57-0067__main__20"/>reflect that youare the <mod sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13288"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13290"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13290"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13296"/>sole <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13296"/><mod eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13288"/> cause <mod sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13301"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13303"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13303"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13309"/>of its excesses. <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13309"/><mod eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13301"/>.If <lb n="c57-0067__main__21"/>any being felt emotions of benevolence <lb n="c57-0067__main__22"/>towards meI should return thenan <lb n="c57-0067__main__23"/>hundred & ahundred fold; for that <lb n="c57-0067__main__24"/>one creature's sakeI would make peace <lb n="c57-0067__main__25"/>with the whole kind–But I now indulge <lb n="c57-0067__main__26"/>in dreams <mod sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13328"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13330"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13330"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13336"/>of bliss<sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13336"/><mod eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13328"/>that cannot be realized.What <lb n="c57-0067__main__27"/>I <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0067__main__d4e13342">a</del> ask of you is reasonable and moderate.<lb n="c57-0067__main__28"/>I demand a creature of another sexbut <lb n="c57-0067__main__29"/>as hideous as myself.The gratification is <lb n="c57-0067__main__30"/>smallbut it is all that I can receive<lb n="c57-0067__main__31"/>and it shall content me. It is truewe <lb n="c57-0067__main__32"/>shall be monsterscut off from all <lb n="c57-0067__main__33"/>the worldbut on that account we <lb n="c57-0067__main__34"/>shall be more attached to one another<lb n="c57-0067__main__35"/>Our lives will not be happybut they <lb n="c57-0067__main__36"/>will be harmless& free from <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13365"/>the <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13365"/>misery <lb n="c57-0067__main__37"/><mod sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13370"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0067__main__d4e13372">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0067__main__d4e13375"/>which <sga-add eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13375"/><mod eID="c57-0067__main__d4e13370"/> I now feel. I shuddered when I thought <lb n="c57-0068__main__6"/>of the possible consequences of my consent<lb n="c57-0068__main__7"/>but I felt that there was some justice <lb n="c57-0068__main__8"/>in his argument. My food is not that of man; I <lb n="c57-0068__main__19"/>do not destroy the lamb orthe kidto <lb n="c57-0068__main__20"/>glut my appetite.Acorns & berries afford <lb n="c57-0068__main__21"/>me sufficient nourishment. The picture I present to you <lb n="c57-0068__main__28"/>is peaceful & humanand you must <lb n="c57-0068__main__29"/>feel that you could deny it only in <lb n="c57-0068__main__30"/>the wantonessof power & cruelty. Pitiless <lb n="c57-0068__main__31"/>as you aretowards meI see <w ana="start"/>compassi<lb n="c57-0068__main__32"/>on<w ana="end"/> in your eyes.Let me seize the <lb n="c57-0068__main__33"/>favourable moment& <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0068__main__d4e13539">pro</del> persuade <lb n="c57-0068__main__34"/>you to promise what I so ardently <lb n="c57-0068__main__35"/>desire.<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0068__main__36"/>You promise,replied I, to quitthe habitations <lb n="c57-0069__main__1"/>of man andto inhabitthose wilds where <lb n="c57-0069__main__2"/>the beasts of the field will be your only <w ana="start"/>co<mod sID="c57-0069__main__d4e13566"/> <mdel>n</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0069__main__d4e13570"/>m <sga-add eID="c57-0069__main__d4e13570"/><mod eID="c57-0069__main__d4e13566"/><lb n="c57-0069__main__3"/>panions<w ana="end"/>.How can youwho long for the love <lb n="c57-0069__main__4"/>& sympathy of <mod sID="c57-0069__main__d4e13581"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0069__main__d4e13583">human being</del> <mdel>s</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0069__main__d4e13588"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0069__main__d4e13588"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0069__main__d4e13594"/>man <sga-add eID="c57-0069__main__d4e13594"/><mod eID="c57-0069__main__d4e13581"/>persevere in <lb n="c57-0069__main__5"/>this exile?
